title: Humans as Animals

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "next" on one switch and "speak!" on the other.
• Hold up the animal pictures one by one and speak out what is on the card e.g. "lion."
• When the switch chooses "next" put the current picture down and show the next one in the pile.
• When the switch user chooses "say it!" you must make the sound of the animal on the card you’re holding e.g. if you’re holding a duck, say "quack quack!"

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to scan through pictures of animals and choose which animal the other player must impersonate e.g choosing a cow the player must say "moo"
